title: Bug 116564 - Hyperlink builder title changes with settings
description: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with the settings.
OB: Clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the hyperlink builder, it is observed that the title of the hyperlink builder becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Open the hyperlink builder.
3. Click on 'OK' to save.
4. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
